text: although i havent been there since my experience i dont have the urge to go back the night my friend and i decided to try it out we drove up to a parking lot full of cadillacs and buicks which should have been a sign we parked our van and noticed a large intimidating guy standing by the front door we approached him and he looked at us as if wondering why two white girls were there we were wondering the same thing until we entered and every african american person in the building turned to stare at us it felt like a scene from an old western where a cowboy walks into a saloon and all the criminals look up with daggers in their eyes we stood there for a moment and then a guy started hitting on my friend i pulled her sleeve and we backed out i could feel people staring at us as we left maybe it was the wrong night please note i am not racist and i would have loved to stay and party with everyone the only reason we left was because we felt entirely unwelcome
seed: granted i havent been in since my experience i really dont have a desire to go backnnthe night my friend and i decided to give it a whirl well we drove up and the parking lot was full of cadillacs and buicks should have been a sign but we pulled up in the van and parked nthere was a very large foreboding looking guy hanging out at the front door hmmm we walked up and he looked at us like what are these two white girls doing here we were wondering why until we stepped inside and every african american person in the building which was all of them swung around to look at us it was seriously just like the old westerns where the cowboy walks into the saloon and all of the crooks and criminals look up with daggers in their eyes nwe stood there for a hot second a guy started hitting on my friend so i pulled on her shirt sleeve and we literally backed out of thereni could feel people staring at the backs of our heads as we leftnnhmm maybe we were there on the wrong nightnnnnfor the record because im sure someone will get offended i am in no way racist and i would have loved to stay and party with everyone the only reason we left was because we felt entirely completely unwelcome

text: as a devoted louis vuitton customer with several limited edition handbags purchased from their champselysees store in paris i appreciate the brand for its quality and style generally i have received outstanding service at all their global locations however my recent interaction with joel at this particular store has left me deeply disappointed i have never encountered such an impolite salesperson as i attempted to make a purchase over the phone it was a simple transaction since they had the item i desired i can only imagine how disrespectful they would be in person i hope that management takes the time to review and improve their service as there are numerous complaints regarding customer service at this store i have experienced it firsthand now there are plenty of louis vuitton stores in las vegas so i recommend avoiding this one unless they decide to restaff its truly unfortunate as the store itself is absolutely beautiful
seed: i am a loyal lv customer with even a couple limited edition handbags purchased overseas at the champsu00c9lysu00e9es store in paris i love the brand for the quality and style i have always gotten excellent service at all stores globally until dealing with this one especially with joel i have never dealt with such a rude sales person as i was trying to make a purchase via phone it was an easy sale as they had what i wanted i can only just imagine how rude they are in person i hope that management takes a good look and reevaluates their service as there are tons of complaints about customer service with this store and now i have experienced it as well there are tons of lv stores in vegas go elsewhere unless they decide to restaff it is such a shame as this store is absolutely beautiful

text: i had the worst sushi experience at a place where i ordered bluefin yellowfin and salmon sashimi besides the bluefin the other fish didnt look fresh and had poor texture someone mentioned that their rice tasted like uncle bens which was spoton  it was bland and not sticky at all the miso soup was acceptable but thats usually hard to mess up ive had great sushi in the midwest specifically cleveland but this place is not worth visiting madison deserves better so order pizza instead
seed: singularly the worst sushi i have eateni ordered bluefin yellowfin and salmon sashimi besides the bluefin the fish didnt look fresh  the texture wasnt good either someone made a comment that their rice is like uncle bens  i couldnt have said it better myself so bland and so not sticky the miso soup wasnt bad but it is impossible to screw that upwell almost ive had good sushi in the midwest notably cleveland but this is definitely not the place to goorder pizza insteadnmadison you deserve better

text: the employees at this store have a bad attitude i was in a few weeks ago and purchased two pairs of nike shoes what happened to the old days when they helped you put your shoes on all they do is take them out of the box and hand them to you no one seems real happy about being there i also asked for shoelaces for my nike hyperdunks they sold me two pairs which were not long enough they told me that was the longest they had and that was what i needed i didnt find out until i got home that they were about a foot too short to fit right i went back yesterday to try and get the right size but the attitude was the same it appears all they have are laces that are made by the foot locker they wont make any type of attempt to order from nike what you need whats up you sell their shoes but wont get their shoelaces all they play on the stereo in there is ghetto gangstertype rap music who wants to hear that crap they finally told me if i wanted laces to go to nike somewhere on scottsdale blvd they dont even know where nike is located i will never buy another pair of shoes from this store

text: i concur with others that this experience would have been more enjoyable and fun if i were younger and knew there would be numerous children present however the reality was that the adults and teenagers were much more difficult to deal with two middleaged women around forty years old stood in line behind my boyfriend and me and were shouting as if they were at a concert they would not stop talking about every little thing they observed and kept interrupting other peoples conversations in essence these types of events attract people from all walks of life so be prepared for an airportlike experience the entire event was quite dull and involved lengthy lines focusing mainly on the avengers characters for political correctness they included the black panther and the shehulk a strong female character none of the registration kiosks were open indicating that they never fixed their it issues the technology used is somewhat outdated and frankly a lot of the interactive games were of the same quality as disneyquest in chicago which closed in 2001 seeing the cox logo on a screen was in poor taste and im surprised i didnt see more sponsorship logos around ultimately its not worth the drive headache or money to attend i would rather drive to universal studios florida from arizona and
seed: i agree with others that this would have been more entertaining and fun if i were younger nni knew there would be many children so i went in with that expectation in reality the adults and teenagers were much harder to deal with two fortysomething year old women stood in line behind my boyfriend and me and they shouted as if they were at a concert they would not shut up about every little thing they observed and kept butting into other peoples conversations long story shortthese kinds of events attract idiots and people of all walks of life so brace yourself for an airportlike experiencennthe entire event was rather boring and full of long lines it focused on the avengers characters but for political correctness they threw in the black panther and the strong woman type shehulk nnnone of the registration kiosks were open so it seems they never fixed their it issues the technology is a bit dated and to be honest a lot of the interactive games were of same quality as disneyquest in chicago closed since 2001 seeing the cox logo on a screen was in bad taste im surprised i didnt see more sponsorship logos around nnits not worth the drive headache or money to go i would rather drive to universal studios florida from az and stand in their lines for some decent thrill rides than this load of crap

text: this establishment ought to be closed down by the authorities due to their unsanitary practices such as serving spoiled meat and disregarding hygiene protocols the stench inside is unbearable making it the filthiest restaurant ive ever encountered we ordered food but upon reading a journal article about the place online my girlfriend and i feigned an emergency to escape ive never done that before and feel terrible for those who dine there without researching it first
seed: this place should be shut down by the government dirty they serve rancid meat and do not follow proper hygiene techniques it smells so awful inside this is the dirtiest restaurant i have ever seen we ordered something then my girlfriend googled it to check reviews the article written by the journal showed up and we pretended we had an emergency and ran out ive never done that before i feel bad for anyone who eats there and doesnt use the internet

text: last night i attended a santana concert at the hard rocks the joint a show im always thrilled to see since ive loved his music for years as i usually am i was alone so i decided to have dinner at mr luckys before the event likewise i was seated alone at the restaurant and servers often dislike these smallertipping tables despite the restaurant being busy the service was slow i ordered the prime rib special not realizing it would be the toughest piece of beef ive ever eaten in my 60 years i was even tempted to send it back but i was short on time for the show if i hadnt been rushed i would have returned the dish the server was pleasant but they never asked if i needed anything else while the other menu items look appealing im unsure if id return to try them again
seed: i went to the hard rock last night for the santana show at the joint which is an amazing show ive loved his music for years i was alone as i am most times so i decided to eat at mr luckys before the show i was alone there also and we all know servers hate tables of one due to the smaller tip theyre gonna get service was slow but it was busy i ordered the prime rib special bad choice im not a big prime rib fan but it sounded good for a change im 60 years old and this was the toughest piece of beef ive ever been served i was even tempted to send it backwhich i have only once that i remember  but i was running out of time to go to the show so i decided to eat what i could if id not been pressed for time i would have returned it and of course the server while pleasant never did ask if i needed anything else etc maybe if id made a different choice id had a better meal the other items on the menu look interesting but not sure sure id ever go back again to try them

text: i had mixed feelings about this restaurant while the food wasnt awful it didnt live up to the standard i anticipated for a place with such a price range and reputation i ordered the special which included a house salad ribeye creamed spinach and dessert additionally i had escargot and garlic cheese bread the garlic cheese bread was delicious the escargot was tasty but not served in the shell as i had in paris the ribeye was cooked perfectly but the cut was average the creamed spinach was overly creamy and bland the dessert was good i only dined here because i had a 100 gift card although it was worth it due to the discount i have no desire to return as there are numerous other steakhouses in las vegas to try
seed: i was disappointed with this restaurant  the food is not bad by any stretch but it is not of the quality i expect from a restaurant in this price range and with such a reputationnni ordered the special which for me consisted of a house salad ribeye creamed spinach and dessert  i also ordered escargot and we had garlic cheese breadnnthe garlic cheese bread was very good  the escargot was flavorful but i was hoping for escargot served in the shell like i had in paris  the ribeye was cooked perfectly but the cut seemed to be of average quality  the creamed spinach was too creamy and somewhat bland  the dessert was goodnnthe only reason i ate here is because i had a 100 gift card to spend  overall it was definitely worth it because of the 100 discount  however i have no need to return and there are so many other steak houses in las vegas to try

text: surprisingly this airport has more business than one would expect and us airways is the most popular airline although the airport is great overall im unsure of my feelings towards it it has numerous food and waiting areas and a smalltown feel with white rocking chairs however i noticed the workers and locals were extremely rude which was disappointing considering the nice town they live in
seed: shockingly this is an aiport that has more business that you would think it is always busy here and the most popular airline is us airways so i am not sure how i feel about that the aiport as whole is great and has lots of places you can grab food or kill some time while you are waiting for your plane the cutest thing is also the fact that they have white rocking chairs for you to sit in while you are waiting and gives you a more homey and small town feel nnwhen i landed here initially i got off the plane and was thrown off at the fact that i had to walk doen  the steps of the plane and walk outside before getting to my gate definitely a first other than that i enjoyed my time at the aiport nnthe one thing that i did notice though was that all the peope in the aiport who worked there or were from there were extremely rude i am not sure why that is since it is such a nice town but every person i had to talk to seemed like they hated everyone really irriated me and i hated being there i am not sure how you can manage to be that unhappy when you live in a nice town blew my mind away but than again i will never get  people i am from chicago and the people there are nicer than they were here

text: this airport is quite busy despite its unexpected amount of business the most popular airline here is us airways and although the airport is overall great im not sure how i feel about it there are plenty of places to grab food and kill time and the white rocking chairs give it a cozy smalltown atmosphere however my experience was marred by the rude behavior of airport workers and locals which i found confusing considering the nice town they live in

text: we used a 25 coupon at a cafe in the luxor before driving back to la on sunday the food was average for this type of place but overpriced and the service was poor due to understaffing during the morning rush unless you have a coupon its best to skip this cafe
seed: we had a 25 dollar coupon we had to use at the luxor so before we drove back to la on sunday we had brunch at this cafe the food was about what youd expect at a place like this and it was perfectly edible but the prices were outrageous i know its vegas and i adjust my views accordingly nnit also had poor service this wasnt our extremely harried waiters fault  he apparently had 16 tables to cover in the morning rush this shouldnt have been a surprise onslaught after checkout time of course theres going to be a rush but they had far too few waiters and they had a long line form at the hostess table despite having a third of the restaurant emptynnskip this place either just get a bagel at starbucks on your way out or stop somewhere on the road unless youre in our situation with a coupon theres really no reason to go here

text: on our way back to la we had brunch at a cafe in the luxor using a 25 coupon the food was decent but expensive and the wait staff was overwhelmed due to a lack of servers during the checkout rush we wouldnt recommend this cafe unless you have a coupon like we did

text: my french fry barometer detected an issue and i have to say is feeling a bit peeved i understand i might sound annoyed but there is absolutely no reason for subpar tepid fried food particularly during noon hours in a food court really its just not acceptable i receive a gift certificate annually from one of my occupations and while i appreciate the kindness i would genuinely prefer some wellcooked crispy food the onion rings were cold and i must say i was quite bothered you could say my undergarments were in a knot

text: the my florist cafe a beloved fixture in downtown phoenix has been replaced by the burger shop this new establishment offers a fresh and updated appearance as well as convenient parking which is a significant advantage over its competitor five guys across the street the atmosphere and food received positive feedback with a good price for a meal consisting of a burger drink and fries it was considered a notch above five guys and slightly below smashburger but still not as exceptional as fuddruckers
seed: this took over the my florist cafe a downtown phoenix staple that will be missed  the burger shop has a fresh new look to the area and is great for that cornernnthere was good parking which is not the case across the street at 5 guys so i think they will gain more businessnnatmosphere  6nfood  6nnit was a great price for the meal  670 for burger drink fries  i would call it a gloried in n out  ni would rank it better then 5 guys just behind smashburger but way behind fuddruckers

text: the burger shop has taken over the location previously occupied by the my florist cafe a muchloved establishment in downtown phoenix the new restaurant offers a refreshing and modern look to the area and provides ample parking unlike its neighbor five guys customers appreciated the atmosphere food quality and affordable prices ranking it higher than five guys but below smashburger and fuddruckers

text: i had a subpar experience with a vegetable burrito today the burrito was large and contained rice light beans and mas due to the ingredients the rolling process was a mess and i had to eat it with a knife and fork the guacamole was still delicious which slightly elevated the burrito however the chicken was of poor quality and not white meat while the beef looked unappetizing this visit was a onetime event every six months interestingly this month marks the chains 20th anniversary with the first location opening in denver colorado the safety during my visit was high as eight police officers were also dining the line moved quickly but for better chicken consider cafe rio
seed: had an amateur roller today the veggie burrito is made big and i messed up the rolling process by getting mas rice light beans and the roller could not handle the switch it was knife and fork city upon my return home guacamole is still great and really makes the burrito slightly above average chicken is poor quality and not white meat and beef looked bad this visit once every 6 months did you know that this month is the chains 20th birthday and the first one was in denver co felt very safe as 8 cops were also eating dinner as i was getting to go order line moved fast but if you want chicken try cafe rio much better

text: a fantastic location for grabbing breakfast and potentially lunch this spot is quite casual making it ideal for those rolling out of bed following a wild night of partying in las vegas citizens offers a dark coffee brew which may not be for everyone but its still enjoyable when in need of caffeine their yogurt parfaits and bacon maple dishes make for a quick and delicious breakfast while their pancakes have been reported as yummy by satisfied customers the ambiance resembles an upscale diner with subway tiles and wine bottles although they have a dinner menu there are many other dining options in the mandalay area that may be more appealing for evening meals
seed: great place to grab breakfast and possibly lunch  it is very casual so if you are rolling out of bed after a night of partying hard in vegas this is your placenni have to say if you like dark coffee you will love citizens  i do not like a dark brew but when you need coffee anything will donni like their yogurt parfaits and their bacon maple for a quick breakfast  hubby devoured their pancakes so they must have been yummy  nnthe decor kind of reminds me of a diner with a more upscale feel subway tile and wine bottles  there is a dinner menu but to me there are so many other places in mandalay to eat that this is not where i would choose to go

text: this place is the perfect choice for breakfast or lunch especially if youre feeling a little rough after a night out on the town the atmosphere is laidback so you dont have to worry about dressing up the coffee is on the darker side but it hits the spot when you need a caffeine fix their yogurt parfaits and bacon maple dish are great for a quick bite in the morning the pancakes come highly recommended too the interior has a diner vibe with a touch of sophistication featuring subway
seed: great place to grab breakfast and possibly lunch  it is very casual so if you are rolling out of bed after a night of partying hard in vegas this is your placenni have to say if you like dark coffee you will love citizens  i do not like a dark brew but when you need coffee anything will donni like their yogurt parfaits and their bacon maple for a quick breakfast  hubby devoured their pancakes so they must have been yummy  nnthe decor kind of reminds me of a diner with a more upscale feel subway tile and wine bottles  there is a dinner menu but to me there are so many other places in mandalay to eat that this is not where i would choose to go

text: when i first visited hush puppies years ago i wasnt impressed but that wouldnt be fair as i wasnt a fan of fried catfish back then nine years later my taste has evolved along with my waist size and hush puppies has the best catfish ive ever had the coating and seasoning remind me of fried chicken which i love however i dont care for their namesake dish the hush puppies due to their texture the gumbo was good and the salad bar is alright i would definitely go back to hush puppies

text: for my birthday in 2013 my wife and i dined at eleven we kicked off our meal with genuine and delectable champagne we opted for the chefs tasting menu featuring scallop salad lamb fish and dessert all dishes were delicious this restaurant offers a fun upscale and tasty dining experience but be prepared to spend around 200 on dinner while we werent completely blown away by the food we found it good and enjoyable
seed: my wife and dined at eleven for my birthday in 2013  we started out with glasses of champagne which was authentic and delicious  we then decided to do the chefs tasting menu  they had a scallop salad lamb fish and dessert  all were very tasty  noverall this is a fun restaurant  very upscale very tasty  the prices are high so expect to go there and spend 200 on dinner  we were not blown away with the food but it was very good and enjoyable

text: i experienced their champagne brunch on sunday and it was delightful featuring dishes like menudo posole enchiladas pan dulce and many other options despite my usual anxiety about mexican buffets las fuentes exceeded my expectations by offering a wide variety of delicious food the service was topnotch and judging by the crowded atmosphere this new establishment is set for success
seed: tried out their champagne brunch on sunday and it was a treat from menudo posole enchiladas pan dulce and a lot of other choices im usually pretty nervous when i hear mexican buffet but after trying pretty much everything at las fuentes not only was i stuffed but wanted to wait around a while just so i could have more service was excellent and judging by the crowd this new place wont have any problems staying busy

text: an autozone is a store that has almost everything you need for your car they have oil batteries and even stylish accessories like ed hardy steering wheel covers not only that but they now carry highquality detailing products from the griots garage line which are great for keeping your car clean and shiny
seed: its an autozone what else can i say  you need some oil head on over a battery tested yep they have you covered  an ed hardy steering wheel coverwell i believe youd be set once againnnheres the real point of my review  they now carry certain items from the griots garage product line  dont know what that means its some of the best products for detailing your car  how do i know this and how am i familiar with the line  i used to show cars and am still a fanatic about my cars cleanliness at all times  its going to set you back some more coin than the rubbish from turtle wax but you get what you pay for

text: best buy and i have a long history going back to when i also had a friendly relationship with circuit city however circuit city disappeared in a corporate magic trick leaving only memories its now 2014 and although the best buy brand still struggles im glad theres still a place to go for electronics and accessories shopping the tangible experience of holding and testing products cannot be replaced by online shopping black friday is a yearly event full of discounts and long lines and ive found some great deals in the past besides the deals the customer service at best buy is what keeps me coming back as the associates are helpful without being intrusive all in all i give best buy a 35star rating which ill round up to 4 for the holiday season
seed: bestbuy and i go way back way back when i used to also be on friendly terms with circuit city before cc up and did a corporate houdini disappearing and not reappearing trick on me  but enough about my past failed relationships it is 2014 but not for much longer lets talk about what is in the now and the futurennthe best buy brand is still struggling just like in the tough years that lead to ccs eventual brick and mortar stores being liquidated in 2009 since the economy is still soft the online and very real competitive threats still remained and growing bigger and bolder  but i am glad there is still a bb to go to when i am aimlessly shopping for electronics or accessories that i may or may not know i need or want  seriously there is nothing that can beat holding something tangible in your hand when shopping for a new piece of equipment or experiencing the visual and audio components of your new udtv or 3d audio equipment for your home theater upgrade 1 for sure on that alonennblack fridays is an annual festival of barely contained consumerism in a time when many are still questioning the pace of economic recovery  long lines earlier store opening time and diverse selections of seemingly crazy markdowns on items from all product categories  last year i scored 20 game of thrones season 1 and 2 on bluray even after arriving to the party late  i had to look really hard for them but it was still in stock  this year no sale on got but i still ended up spending more than i should on more bluray movies  season sets plus a laptop so cheap it can practically be considered disposablennon typical weekdays and weekends bb still have some decent sales promotions  but you really have to look hard for the best in class deals  doctor who season 5 and 6 on bluray for also 20 apiece  sweet these were like 30 on the big a dot com plus shipping at the time i scored that deal alas i never saw such great deals on doctor who season sets ever again  insert sad facennbesides the good deals and sometimes really good deals the reason i continue to shop here and the other best buy stores is their customer service  bb associates typically will ask if they can help you with what you are looking for except on black friday weekends which is cool if you need help but they are okay if you just want to be left alone to wander the aisles of merchandise aimlessly for an hour or more  looking to buy electronics that does not appeared to be stocked asking any associates that is not currently assisting another customer is the way to go  most of them are good at their job and some of them i have discovered are really persistent like when they look for something that is supposedly in stock but is not located where it is supposed to be  i considered that great customer service and is the one thing you typically cant get shopping onlinennso speedy checkout good customer service not too much upselling decent pricing and the ability to tangibly see the items you are shopping for equals 35 stars in my book  since it is the long thanksgiving weekend i will round it up to 4  happy thanksgivingblack friday and cyber monday everyone

text: my history with best buy goes back a long way as i used to have a friendly relationship with circuit city before they disappeared in 2009 in the present day the best buy brand still faces challenges but i appreciate having a physical store for shopping electronics and accessories the annual black friday event offers numerous deals and their customer service is exceptional i give best buy a 35star rating

text: dont judge this place by its exterior  the inside is beautifully decorated with a rich authentic atmosphere the staff is friendly the food is divine and the bellini and champagne are fantastic
seed: the first thing i have to say about this place is dont judge a book by its cover  the outside of the restaurant and its location could lead one to believe that it was going to be disappointing inside to be honest i only went because of the yelp reviews and then i walked in and bam i was blown away  it was so nicely decorated it had a very richauthentic feel to the place  the staff was over the top friendly the food was simply divine and the bellini champagne and pureed berry was off the chain  nnmy friend and i had pot stickers and spring rolls for apptz  delicious and hot quickly came out as well  main course for lunch for me was the shrimp chili mint noodles it had so many good reviews yum yum yum i had it on heat 8 i have a spicy palate but next time im going to 10 it was spicy but i wanted more   my friend had the pad thai and the only thing i can say about that is i have never liked pad thai i thought it was gross and hated that peanut flavor to it this pad thai was so freaking good im pretty sure im getting this next time seriously nnif you are around this place craving a little ethnic food in your life and thai sounds good dont pass this place youll be crying like a baby caused you missed it

text: the yelp reviews led me to this restaurant and i was amazed by the elegant interior hospitable staff and delicious food the shrimp chili mint noodles were exceptional and the pad thai which i usually dislike was surprisingly delicious

text: i wrote a review for our yelp birthday party but not the museum itself we recently visited the selected shorts exhibit of short films after having lunch at arcadia farms there were seven unique shorts and the exhibit was free we didnt have to pay for entry since we were eating lunch
seed: ok so i had written a review of our yelp birthday party but not of the museum itselfnjust got back from the selected shorts exhibit  short films  after having lunch in arcadia farms a group of 12 of us headed to the film festival no festival required  seven shorts all very different  and the exhibit was free  we didnt even have to pay to get into the museum since we were having lunch  nentering the theater was really cool  stadium seating which i hadnt expected  when youre a shorty like me stadium seating is a must unless you want to deal with a crink in yer neck  there was a stage with the screen above it so even the people in front would have a good view without said crink  no popcorn but the seats were comfy  staff was really friendly and it started and ended when they said it would  gaspndefinitely going to be back to the museum and most definitely going to catch screenings in the theater

text: we had a great experience at the short film festival selected shorts following our lunch at arcadia farms it was free and we didnt even have to pay to enter the museum the theater had stadium seating which was great for short people like me as it prevented neck strain

text: after our lunch we went to the selected shorts exhibit of short films which was free we didnt have to pay to enter the museum and the theater had stadium seating making it comfortable for everyone the staff was friendly and the event started and ended on time well definitely be back to the museum and catch more screenings in the theater
